I have never spoken to girl. I am 20 year old.
Q: What do I do?
A: Take pictures of her. Keep no pictures longer then 5 sec. of her face on your phone. Do not cover her. She might record a video. Do not share any pictures or videos of her.
Q: What about names. What do I do with the names?
A: You must not mention their names in front of her. If you have an alibi and your name is not mentioned in the case, you might be able to say you are innocent.
This game caused me to break up with my girlfriend. 10/10 worth it
Wporzo, chodź dużo cheaterów i dzieci z Rosji.

The custom player models have really dented the enjoyment that one could derive from this game. Besides the issues with visibility against backgrounds, the models have the even worse issue of not being immediately recognizable as T or CT. 

When you cannot tell what team someone is on immediately by looking at them, the game is not worth playing. Go play Source or 1.6.

It is a cool game that challenges you how to use your skill in aiming properly and your game sense in the game. When you get to like the game, you will get addicted to it and you will keep on playing this game until you feel you are so much better than you started playing it.
Overall it's one of the best FPS games out there.
If you like raging, getting in bad match making pools, get screwed over by cases, this game is for you!
